instruction: Generate a list of steps for resetting a computer's password.
output:
- Power on the computer 
- Wait for the opening screen to appear 
- Select ‘Start’ and ‘Control Panel’ 
- Choose ‘User Accounts’ 
- Select ‘Change your Windows password’ 
- Enter the current password 
- Enter the new password 
- Confirm the new password 
- Select ‘Change password’ 
- Update any other passwords that are linked to the computer 
- Log out of all accounts 
- Log back in to the account using the new password
